item.description:
Saturday, September 6th from 12:00 - 2:00, we'll be hosting a meetup for gamers North of Boston! Finally a chance for lots of us to gather without having to travel so far south.

Toy Soldier is in Amesbury, right near 495, 95, and the NH border.
Parking is on-street (no meters) and driving directions can be found at their website:
http://www.amesburyga...

Since this is the first meetup for the northern group, there's no set agenda, but we'll have snacks and we encourage you to bring a friend! Anyone looking to run a game? Anyone looking for players for a new or existing game?
Come with an open mind! Bring your ideas! Bring a pencil! Bring your dice!
A game could spontaneously break out at any time!

See you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Room in the back - or ask the person at the counter
item.name: Calling all North of Boston Gamers! (NH too)
